html:
```html Your Hair Recovery Protocol – Week 3

Week 3: Your Custom Hair Loss Recovery Protocol

Based on your survey responses, we’ve tailored a protocol that addresses your unique needs in nutrition, stress resilience, and overall wellbeing—key drivers in halting hair loss and supporting regrowth.

  • Win Your Day with Breakfast: Start mornings with quick, protein-rich, anti-inflammatory meals. We’ll guide you with fun options—whether you’re vegan or omnivore—to energize your day and feed your follicles.
  • The Popeye Protocol: Easily boost iron with smart food choices while avoiding habits that block absorption, ensuring strong, healthy hair from the inside out.
  • Eat More Good Fats: Increase omega-3s for scalp and follicle nourishment, while steering clear of poor-quality sources. We’ll make it simple to get the right fats that actively protect and restore hair health.

This week is about setting small, achievable wins in your routine. Each practice is designed to reduce stress on your body, improve nutrient availability, and keep hair growth on track. Consistency here equals visible results—let’s make it happen!

```
